name: Snappy (Error::3080)
description: Hello Everyone, I have just released a new game, but it currently only has 2 levels. I am not that successful so until I get more successful, I will only make 2 levels. How to play:  arrow keys, not including down arrow,  avoid spikes, flags won't work so it might trigger some people, and you only have 45 moves to complete each level.
